trans-unit.source: Acts as a container to a group of activities that is executed when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> starts running.
trans-unit.target: Actúa como un contenedor para un grupo de actividades que se ejecutan al empezar a ejecutarse <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> acts as a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> to all activities it contains.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> actúa como <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> para todas las actividades que contiene.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classes may be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.

If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> exists in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is the first activity that gets executed when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts executing.
trans-unit.target: Si existe una <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> en una <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> es la primera actividad que se ejecuta cuando se empieza a ejecutar <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.

trans-unit.source: In some ways the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is like an `OnEnterState` handler.
trans-unit.target: De cierta forma, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> es como un controlador `OnEnterState`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is not a mandatory activity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> no es una actividad obligatoria en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> es una <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, lo que significa que <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> puede contener otras actividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> cannot contain any activity that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, which includes all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activities and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> no puede contener ninguna actividad que implemente la interfaz <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>, que incluye todas las actividades <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> y la actividad <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is executed in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, a non-blocking manner that makes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> ready to receive events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> se ejecuta en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> de una forma sin bloqueos que prepara a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> para recibir eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> activity, so that it can model a state machine where transitions occur from state to state without receiving any event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> puede contener una actividad <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity>, por lo que puede modelar un equipo de estado donde se producen las transiciones entre estados sin recibir ningún evento.

trans-unit.source: In that sense the state machine behaves like a sequential workflow.
trans-unit.target: En ese sentido, el equipo de estado se comporta como un flujo de trabajo secuencial.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> object.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra cómo crear una nueva instancia de un objeto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the State Initialization SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo pertenece al ejemplo de SDK de inicialización de estados.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de la actividad definido por el usuario.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> utilizando el nombre de la actividad.
